title: 007 - John Branyan - Small Towns, Salmon Jackets, and Petite Quiche
description:
Listen in as Tim and long time friend John Branyan discuss John's wardrobe, bringing a clothes dryer on stage, and what Batman villain, Bane, has been up to lately. Also, Jack Hanna lets a puma loose on the bus, Freight tries to stave off the black plague, all whilst John dotes on his grandchildren.
 Don't forget to tweet the guys your comments, questions, and alternative uses for baking soda at @poddybreak
 Get more of John Branyan at:
 http://jbcomedy.webflow.io/
 or on twitter @john_branyan
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: Are you walking to the post office?
